title: Alumni Night
description: The Engineering Physics Alumni Night is coming fast. Come by the ESC on April 3rd from 6:00 to 9:00, grab a drink and gather some wisdom from former Fizzers. Entry for students is $5. If you would like to come by, please <a href="https://ubc.ca1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_1WUnCOBtjIYcHwV">RSVP here<a>.

title: Elections Results
description: Elections are over and the results are in. Check out the new and returning members of the 2019-2020 Fizz Executive Team in the executives tab above.

title: Graduate Survey
description:
A Note to our Graduating Class....

Congratulations on all your hard work, Its been a long road to get to this point and I hope all of you look back upon your degree with mostly fond memories. You've been here longer than most of us so we want to know what you think. Please fill out this survey to give Fizz some valuable insight into your plans after graduation.
